faq.question: Which platforms does Creator Control Center support?
faq.answer: Creator Control Center supports Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Twitter/X, Facebook, and Meta Ad accounts. You can manage all your social media channels in one unified dashboard, making multi-platform content creation and analytics seamless and efficient.

faq.question: Is there a free plan available?
faq.answer: Yes, the free plan allows you to manage 1 channel with basic analytics. Upgrade to PRO or ENTERPRISE plans to access more channels and advanced features including AI insights, automated reports, and creator management tools.

faq.question: What is the AI-powered customer support feature?
faq.answer: This is a feature for business customers that uses Gemini AI to automatically generate draft responses to creator inquiries. You can securely register your Gemini API key in the manager dashboard to use this feature, reducing customer support time by over 80%.

faq.question: How often is the analytics data updated?
faq.answer: Data is collected and updated in real-time. You can immediately check the latest performance metrics on your dashboard with auto-refresh functionality to keep you always up-to-date.

faq.question: What YouTube analytics features do you provide?
faq.answer: We provide comprehensive YouTube analytics including subscriber count, view count, likes, comments, watch time, traffic sources, demographics, and more. Additional features include content performance comparison, optimal upload time recommendations, and revenue analytics.

faq.question: What Instagram analytics are available?
faq.answer: Our Instagram analytics include follower growth trends, post engagement rates (likes, comments, saves, shares), story views, reels performance, hashtag analysis, and optimal posting times. All insights are visualized for easy understanding.

faq.question: How can MCN agencies use this platform?
faq.answer: MCN agencies and talent managers can manage all their creators in one place. Features include creator performance comparison, approval management, revenue distribution data, and consolidated reporting for efficient influencer management.

faq.question: Is my data secure and private?
faq.answer: All data is encrypted and stored securely following industry-standard security protocols. We use OAuth authentication to connect with social media accounts and never store passwords. We are fully compliant with GDPR and privacy regulations.

faq.question: Can I connect multiple channels simultaneously?
faq.answer: Yes, you can connect multiple channels based on your plan. The free plan supports 1 channel, PRO supports 5 channels, and ENTERPRISE supports unlimited channels. All connected channels' data is integrated for comprehensive performance insights.

faq.question: Do you provide growth insights for creators?
faq.answer: Our AI-powered recommendation system provides personalized insights for channel growth. This includes content optimization suggestions, target audience analysis, trending keyword recommendations, upload time optimization, and data-driven growth strategies.

faq.question: What is AI Performance Director?
faq.answer: AI PD acts like a dedicated marketing manager, analyzing all channel data in real-time and telling you exactly what to do next week. It provides 5 core features: content strategy suggestions, ad performance analysis, growth opportunity alerts, weekly action plans, and sentiment analysis.

faq.question: How does Meta Ads optimization work?
faq.answer: Through Meta Ads API integration, we monitor ROAS, CPC, and conversion rates in real-time. AI recommends scaling successful campaigns and pausing underperforming ones, detects ad creative fatigue, and alerts you when to replace creatives. This reduces ad management time by 90%.

faq.question: Do I need to install anything?
faq.answer: No, it's a web-based service that requires no installation. Simply visit creatorscontrol.com in your browser and start using it immediately. Accessible from mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.

faq.question: What is the pricing?
faq.answer: Personal Free plan is permanently free and allows 1 YouTube and 1 Instagram account. Personal Plus is $29.90/month ($329/year) for 5 channels and AI features. Business plans start at $119/month for up to 100 creators.

faq.question: How long does it take to connect an account?
faq.answer: With OAuth authentication, you can connect your first account in under 5 minutes. Additional channels take 1-2 minutes each. You never enter passwords directlyâ€”everything is done through official platform authentication for security.

howto.name: Getting Started with Creator Control Center
howto.description: Connect your first channel and view dashboard data in 5 minutes
supplies: Social media accounts (YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, etc.)

steps.name: Sign up
steps.text: Visit creatorscontrol.com and create a free account with your email and password. Individual creators choose the 'Personal' plan, agencies choose the 'Business' plan.

steps.name: Connect your first channel
steps.text: Click the 'Add Channel' button on your dashboard and select the platform (YouTube, Instagram, etc.) you want to connect. Log in to that platform in the OAuth window that opens and approve the permissions.

steps.name: Verify data sync
steps.text: Within 1-2 minutes after connecting, basic metrics like follower count, recent posts, and engagement rate will appear on your dashboard. Use the 'Refresh' button to fetch the latest data.

steps.name: Check AI recommendations
steps.text: View personalized growth advice in the 'AI Recommendations' section at the bottom of your dashboard. Get optimal upload times, recommended hashtags, and content ideas.

steps.name: Connect additional channels (optional)
steps.text: Based on your plan, connect additional channels to start multi-platform analytics. Compare data from all channels on one screen and generate integrated reports.
